channel.title: Posts
channel.description: Why arnt posts displayed under your name?

item.title: Posts
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Wenis Tree:

i know… ive been here longer than you lol.

The reason post count isn’t displayed prominently on this website can be described perfectly by your own post, specifically this one here. People care a great deal about anything that gives them bragging rights, such as date registered, ranks, post count, etc. Having post counts prominently displayed leads to people making almost spam posts to inflate their post count for bragging rights. Having people make spam posts to stroke their ego has a net negative impact on the forums.

Read full topic

item.title: Posts
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I’d rather have my post count displayed under someone else. To confuse the hell out of everyone.

Read full topic

item.title: Posts
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:8, topic:519866”][quote author=Wenis Tree link=topic=638359.msg4302856#msg4302856 date=1369267055]

To start, who cares about post count? It doesn’t make you any more respected than the next guy.
If you care about post count, then you can view how many times you’ve posted by clicking on the profile tab or by clicking on someone’s username.

i know… ive been here longer than you lol.
[/quote]
You gotta earn your stripes boy, its not by when you registered.

Anyways this is an absolutely stupid idea imo. There is no reason for it, it would just be wasted bytes on my limited bandwidth.[/quote]

Do I have my stripes?

Read full topic

item.title: Posts
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“Wenis Tree, post:5, topic:519866”][quote author=Flame_ link=topic=638359.msg4302853#msg4302853 date=1369266710]
To start, who cares about post count? It doesn’t make you any more respected than the next guy.
If you care about post count, then you can view how many times you’ve posted by clicking on the profile tab or by clicking on someone’s username.
[/quote]

i know… ive been here longer than you lol.[/quote]
And I’ve been here longer than you. So that means I’m right when I say that only idiots care about post counts, and we don’t design the forum for idiots. We shouldn’t hide them, but we shouldn’t show them of either.

Read full topic

item.title: Posts
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

Posts mean shit. I haven’t made an impressive post in years and I’m still better than all of you.

item.title: Posts
item.dc:creator: @Wenis_Tree Wenis Tree
item.description:
@Wenis_Tree wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:9, topic:519866”][quote author=Wenis Tree link=topic=638359.msg4302856#msg4302856 date=1369267055]

To start, who cares about post count? It doesn’t make you any more respected than the next guy.
If you care about post count, then you can view how many times you’ve posted by clicking on the profile tab or by clicking on someone’s username.

i know… ive been here longer than you lol.
[/quote]Its funny how I respect him a lot and yet I don’t respect you at all. Hm. Funny how date registered doesn’t matter.

Post count doesn’t matter and shouldn’t be displayed. Posts don’t make you knowledgeable by any means, just talkative - which isn’t always a good thing. Plus having that displayed under your name makes people more inclined to spam for increased post count, which we don’t want. We want quality posts, not a large quantity of needless ones.[/quote]
cause i never use morparscape…
you obv want a dead forums then.
Appeal is everything, if something looks ugly, why would someone use it when there are nicer things. This forum is ugly af, thats why i never use it.
And since when did i make a convo about respect?

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“Wenis Tree, post:5, topic:519866”][quote author=Flame_ link=topic=638359.msg4302853#msg4302853 date=1369266710]
To start, who cares about post count? It doesn’t make you any more respected than the next guy.
If you care about post count, then you can view how many times you’ve posted by clicking on the profile tab or by clicking on someone’s username.
[/quote]

i know… ive been here longer than you lol.[/quote]Its funny how I respect him a lot and yet I don’t respect you at all. Hm. Funny how date registered doesn’t matter.

Post count doesn’t matter and shouldn’t be displayed. Posts don’t make you knowledgeable by any means, just talkative - which isn’t always a good thing. Plus having that displayed under your name makes people more inclined to spam for increased post count, which we don’t want. We want quality posts, not a large quantity of needless ones.

Read full topic
